portfolio.name: KRKA-RUS
portfolio.title: Quality Assessment specialist
portfolio.description:
I currently work as a Quality Assurance Specialist at the Russian branch of the pharmaceutical company KRKA.
I am responsible for change control quality system across the company, validation and qualification of laboratory instruments and manufacturing equipment.
I also check and confirm verification of microbiological methods protocols and deviations in climatic parameters.

portfolio.name: Scientific Research Center Synthesit, Sochi, Russia
portfolio.title: Medical Research Scientist
portfolio.description: I wrote scientific articles about iron citrate supplements in English and published them in European scientific journals. I provided basic patient consultation and advisory. I translated articles from English to Russian and vice versa. Also I supported my non-medical colleages in my professional expertise.

portfolio.name: JTI Poland, Warsaw, Poland
portfolio.title: Toxicology Information Manager
portfolio.description: I searched scientific databases and literature to collect toxicological, classification, and labeling information related to components used/to be used in JTI products. I read scientific articles, documentation, reports, etc., and assessed the relevance of published toxicological information. I prepared and continuously updated toxicological documentation on ingredient toxicity for tobacco products. I supporting annual classification and labeling of ingredients for our portfolio to support successful chemical registration.

portfolio.name: Jessenius Faculty of Medicine, Comenius University
portfolio.title: PhD Student, Department of Pharmacology
portfolio.description: During my PhD studies, I was involved in teaching students of general medicine, dentistry, nursing, midwifery, and public health. I also wrote professional articles on tuberculosis and inflammatory markers, which was the topic of my research.
